code: import React from"react";import{Redirect}from"react-router-dom";import Markdown from"react-markdown";import Layout from"../components/layout";import postlist from"../posts.json";import"./pages.css";var Post=function Post(props){console.log(postlist);var validId=parseInt(props.match.params.id);if(!validId){return React.createElement(Redirect,{to:"/404"});}var fetchedPost={};var postExists=false;postlist.forEach(function(post,i){if(validId===post.id){fetchedPost.title=post.title?post.title:"No title given";fetchedPost.content=post.content?post.content:"No content given";postExists=true;}});if(postExists===false){return React.createElement(Redirect,{to:"/404"});}return React.createElement(Layout,null,React.createElement("div",{className:"post"},React.createElement("h2",null,fetchedPost.title),React.createElement("small",null,"Published on ",fetchedPost.date," by ",fetchedPost.author),React.createElement("hr",null),React.createElement(Markdown,{source:fetchedPost.content,escapeHtml:false})));};export default Post;
